text: ye ve log hain, jinhonne kufr kiya aur rok diya tumhen masjide haî€¼raam se tatha bali ke pashu ko, unake sthaan tak puhunchane se rok diya aur yadi ye bhay na hota ki tum kuchh musalamaan purushon tatha kuchh musalamaan striyon ko, jinhen tum nahin jaanate the, raund doge jisase tumapar dosh aa jaayega[1] (to yudhd se na roka jaata). taaki pravesh karaaye allaah, jise chaahe, apanee daya mein. yadi ve (musalamaan) alag hote, to ham avashy yaatana dete unhen, jo kaafir ho gaye unamen se, duhkhadaayee yaatana
